page1.an-how-long: zh*The longer you store, the more you save. You're currently benefitting from a 20% off.
page2.an-would-packing: zh*We’ll send you enough to pack everything you want to store.
page3.qu-where-collect: zh*Tell us where to collect your stuff from
page3.an-where-collect: zh*We’ll send you enough to pack everything you want to store.
page4.an-account-info: zh*We’ll send you enough to pack everything you want to store.
page4.qu-close-contact: zh*Have you been in close contact with someone who is on Mandatory Home Quarantine from the Centre For Health Protection, or have been issued one?
page4.qu-covid19: zh*If Yes, ‘contact less” delivery with items to be placed outside the door, while pick-up appointments should only be scheduled after the quarantine period. In addition, we are unable to complete appointments at buildings with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.
page5.an-which-payment: zh*We’ll send you enough to pack everything you want to store.
page6.no-paragraph1: zh*Thank you very much for your purchase. Your order number is {{order}} and confirmation email is sent to {{email}}
cart.no-cancel-notice: zh*FREE to cancel or amend your order if you let us know before 11am two working days prior to your collection or delivery.
common.no-signup-failed: zh*The email address you have provided is already in use.
common.no-input-contact-validate: zh*Contact must be number and the length must be 8.
